text: Pavlovka () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Pavlovsky Selsoviet, Nurimanovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 4,143 as of 2010. There are 44 streets. == Geography == It is located 26 km from Krasnaya Gorka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Nurimanovsky District
title: Pavlovka, Nurimanovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
